about_the_game:
Welcome to "Zombie Reaper", an RPG and TPS game where the evil demon king leads their zombie army to attack our home again, and we will stop them once again.
1UI:
Our UI style is concise and exquisite, and supports 10 languages, making it suitable for most players to better understand our game.
2 Gameplay:
We have set up three modes, traditional mode, endless mode, and maze mode.
Traditional mode:
There are a total of 3 levels of difficulty for players to choose from, and different levels of difficulty will have different changes. Players will be able to feel the amazing changes brought by different levels of difficulty.
Endless mode:
Players will continuously attack enemies in an open world for survival, and in this mode, you will experience enemies attacking like a tide.
Maze mode:
The maze mode is divided into simple maze and complex maze. There are 15 levels for both simple and complex mazes, and players can choose their own levels.
3 gameplay:
This is a design game, but there are different gameplay modes:
Traditional mode:
In this mode, players will control their characters to attack enemies. In different levels and scenes, players will discover various special events, such as portals, boss battles, etc
Endless mode:
Players will engage in battles in the scene they choose, where enemies cannot be killed, and the only condition for victory is survival.
Maze mode:
Players will explore the exit in the maze, which is different from traditional mazes. This is a 3D maze where you will enjoy the occurrence of various events.
4. In terms of art:
Because this is a zombie themed game with a dark art style, it can better bring players into the game.
